### Title
**Caretaker and Maintenance Services for Veterans Cemetery**

### Official Notice Details
** Solicitation Number:** 3000771803
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-10T13:00:00
**Amendment Number:** 3

**Description**
Veterans Cemetery in Esquimalt, British Columbia, is a historic final resting place for those who served at sea. To provide suitable care and maintenance for the cemetery, the government invites proposals for a two-year contract, with an option to extend for three years, to provide caretaker and maintenance services.

**Services**
The contractor will be responsible for the general care and maintenance of the cemetery, including:

* Grass cutting and trimming
* General clean up of the cemetery and its buildings
* Maintenance of equipment and other cemetery assets
* Provision and coordination of related duties, including interments and responding to third-party contractor inquiries.

**Location**
The work will be performed at Veterans Cemetery, Esquimalt, British Columbia.

**Contract Term**
The proposed contract will commence on 2024-06-03 and expire on 2026-03-31, with a possible extension for three years.

**Evaluation Criteria**
The selected contractor will be chosen based on price and their ability to meet the requirements outlined in this tender notice.

**Languages of Procurement**
Information related to this procurement shall be communicated in English or French and the favour of one or the other may be exercised.

**Trade Agreements**
This procurement is open to contractors who meet the requirements under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement.

### Contact Information
If you have any queries, please contact Lynn Paulin at lynn.paulin@veterans.gc.ca or (782) 377-4105.
